course.title: ADM 4352 Advanced Corporate Finance (3 units)
course.desc: Advanced topics in capital budgeting and strategy, real options, capital structure, dividend policy, agency theory, corporate governance, mergers and acquisitions, and empirical studies of corporate performance.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 3350. Course reserved for: 1) B.Com. students who have completed at least 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381; 2) Students completing a Honours BSc in Financial Mathematics and Economics.
